page.title: 18 A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: The alarm goes at 7.30 and I am up by 7.40 for breakfast at 7.45.I have a wash at 8.00 and leave for school at 8.25am.I meet Liane and Marie at 8.25 and arrive at school by 8.45.After registration at 8.50 lessons begin at 9.00.Tutor period is at 10.10 and break from 10.30-10.45.Dinner hours begins at 11.55 and I am home by 12.10pm.The school bell goes again at 1.00 for lessons at 1.05.Lessons end at 2.15pm.From 2.20pm there is a lesson till 3.30.I walk home with friends arriving home at 3.45-50pm.I go over the road to get a paper after I have changed.I lay the table for tea and do any homework I have got.At 5.00 dad comes home and mum at 5.30.I have tea at 5.40 and help clear up tea things.After homework,Iread a book,and about 7.00 pm I watch tv, until 9pm.I retire at about 10 after supper.
